channel.title: Help with client/source/items
channel.description:
sorry about my noobness im kind of new to creating private servers but i have a few requests and i thought id ask and hopefuly if not all atleast some of them i get help with. im not sure which affects the items in game the source or the client so excuse me if i get something wrong
sorry about being lazy but ive tried coding nearly empty sources and pre coded sources and its hard, so i was wondering does anyone have a source and a client that i can use and that has specs, godswords, darkbow, has a reasonable amount of skills working, has decent areas. but if you find an uber awesome source and client then could i please have a link to download ill give major credits to whoever helps plus maker of client/source
my final request is a tricky one and it is driving me insane i have windows vista (which in greek means piece of beep) with a netgear dg834g router and i cannot get it to work so people can connect using my ip i made. i have no-ip duc and ive followed guides maybe someone could talk me through it or use teamviewer to do it for me?
if i can get this sorted ill appreciate it so much and help you in any way i can even if its hosting your server 24/7
sorry about the essay and i apologise if i sound like im just trying to leech everything but im struggeling with coding stuff but im learning very slowly many thanks.
haha dumball :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2008, 01:54:20 pm[/size][hr]6 views and no sugestions?
bump my own post[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2008, 02:36:59 pm[/size][hr]hopeless add on then yes i have used the nooby search bar yes i have found sources and clients and no i havent found one that works why is it i go onto a server and i can use a dark bow dragon full help all new items no problem and it seems to be on every server i go on yet its so difficult for someone to help me out with a server and source that does that

item.title: Help with client/source/items
item.dc:creator: @haha_dumball haha dumball
item.description:
@haha_dumball wrote:

sorry about my noobness im kind of new to creating private servers but i have a few requests and i thought id ask and hopefuly if not all atleast some of them i get help with. im not sure which affects the items in game the source or the client so excuse me if i get something wrong

sorry about being lazy but ive tried coding nearly empty sources and pre coded sources and its hard,
so i was wondering does anyone have a source and a client that i can use and that has specs, godswords, darkbow, has a reasonable amount of skills working, has decent areas. but if you find an uber awesome source and client then could i please have a link to download ill give major credits to whoever helps plus maker of client/source

my final request is a tricky one and it is driving me insane i have windows vista (which in greek means piece of beep) with a netgear dg834g router and i cannot get it to work so people can connect using my ip i made. i have no-ip duc and ive followed guides maybe someone could talk me through it or use teamviewer to do it for me?

if i can get this sorted ill appreciate it so much and help you in any way i can even if its hosting your server 24/7

sorry about the essay and i apologise if i sound like im just trying to leech everything but im struggeling with coding stuff but im learning very slowly
many thanks.

haha dumball :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2008, 01:54:20 pm[/size][hr]6 views and no sugestions?

bump my own post[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 28, 2008, 02:36:59 pm[/size][hr]hopeless
add on then
yes i have used the nooby search bar
yes i have found sources and clients
and no i havent found one that works
why is it i go onto a server and i can use a dark bow dragon full help all new items no problem and it seems to be on every server i go on yet its so difficult for someone to help me out with a server and source that does that
